Tech + Identity Editorial About

hello@alice-lee.com

Hi, I’m Alice! I am an independent SF-based illustrator & designer who loves drawing and telling clever stories. I am a part of a studio of artists called the 1099 group. Previously, I joined Dropbox as the second illustrator on the team, and before that I was a business student at the Wharton School/UPenn studying management and operations, destined to be a banker or consultant.

My two current areas of focus are working on (1) illustration branding and (2) editorial projects, though I am open to all illustration-oriented inquiries! As I have a product design, arts, and front-end background, I love to play in the intersection of digital (web, mobile) & physical (packaging, installations), especially projects that span different or unique mediums.

Want to get in touch? Let’s get tea (or anything chocolate, I love that too)!
